query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

result.title: An urban innovation scan
result.description: Thirty descriptive forms of urban innovations in the OPSI database collected via the OPSI online questionnaire and cases from PIPA, European Green Capital and European Capital Innovation Award. A specific Innovation Challenge will be set up to encourage submission from member countries.

result.title: Design Options Paper “Grassroots Schemes for SMEs”
result.description:
The envisaged Design Option Paper, which will contain outlines and details on possible policy schemes and the development and application of new/better practices for supporting innovation in young SMEs (SMEs created mainly by people from 18 to 35 years of age).
The deliverable will be ensured to be in the public domain.

result.title: Definition of platform architecture and software development configuration
result.description: This report will contain the technical documentation of the base platform, technical documentation and API specification for the plugin system as well as a feasibility study for each one of the use cases. It will also define the descriptions of the plugins with interface definitions and class diagrams. It will finally include the setup of the supporting software for the development process (Wiki / Ticketsystem / CI-Platform) and the quality assurance measures for the process and the results.

result.title: End User Future Innovation Panel Report
result.description: Set up of End User Future Innovation panel to capture stakeholder input (research community, OEMs, operators, industry platforms like EUMaT) on new materials demonstration. Virtual meetings of innovation panel at regular intervals to provide strategic feedback into Steering Committee as part of iterative product development process. Updates from the panel to be shared with wider stakeholder community as appropriate through website blogs and news updates. To be updated annually (M24, 36).

result.title: Technologies for MOVING data processing and visualisation v1.0
result.description: An initial set of data processing and visualisation components are provided that contain a common data model for indexing the full-texts, metadata, HTML content and video data. Initial versions of text and visual mining are applied on that data. Initial implementations of the logging concept, metadata extraction from PDF, author alignment and a functional prototype for data visualisation are provided.

result.title: OpenGovIntelligence challenges and needs
result.description: This report documents the results of the literature review on data infrastructures (T1.1), the elicitation of needs and expectation of service co-production (T1.2), the challenges and needs of publishing and exploiting LOSD for the development of data-driven services (T1.3) and finally the results of the investigation on the relationship between innovation and decision making (T1.4). This deliverable will hence describe in detail the user requirements, best practices, models and challenges and needs extracted from this work package’s tasks.

result.title: Innovation management plan
result.description: This deliverable will detail the activities to be followed concerning innovation management in the project, including aspects related to processes for maintaining high level of innovation throughout the project, updating regarding progress in the state-of-the-art/state-of-practice and ensuring that the innovative character of the project is maintained throughout all activities

result.title: "Project newsletter #1"
result.description: A project newsletter will be published twice a year [M6, M12, M18, M24, M30, M36, M42] to inform the active stakeholders and policy makers about the background of the project, its scientific and training outputs, as well as policy recommendations, but also to mobilize them to actively participate in the project’s conferences and training sessions and in the Technical and Financial Support Instrument.
